summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Gold Jewellery ERP Phase 2: Inventory Management. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI and integration working correctly with minor React key warning in category dropdown.

design_issues.issue: React console warnings about duplicate keys in category dropdown rendering
design_issues.note: Functional but generates console warnings. Categories should use unique keys in mapping.

passed_tests: Backend API Health Check - All endpoints accessible
Category Creation API - All 4 categories (Necklace, Ring, Bangle, Earring)
Category Retrieval API - Get all categories with product counts
Product Creation API - With all jewellery attributes (gold weight, purity, making charges, stones, hallmark)
Product Retrieval API - Get all products with filters (category, low stock, search)
Single Product API - Get product by ID with all required fields
Product Update API - Update details with automatic price recalculation
Stock Update API - Increase/decrease stock with low stock detection
Product Deletion API - Delete product and verify removal
GST Price Calculation - Automatic selling price calculation (base price + GST)
Low Stock Detection - Automatic flagging when quantity <= threshold
Search Functionality - Product search by name and SKU
Category Filtering - Filter products by category
Frontend Login Flow - Admin authentication working
Frontend Navigation - Dashboard to Inventory page
Frontend Inventory Display - Product cards with all details
Frontend Search Interface - Search input and filtering
Frontend Add Product Form - All form fields present and functional
Frontend Product Creation - Complete workflow from form to inventory list
Frontend Price Calculation - Real-time selling price calculation display
Frontend Product List Update - New products appear immediately after creation
Permission-based Access Control - Admin can access all inventory functions

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (22/23 tests passed - 1 minor React warning issue)
